221b1('bum): rig par bya'o/ / stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig
221b2('bum): par bya'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i
221b3('bum): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// tshad pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig
221b4('bum): par bya'o/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i
221b5('bum): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon
221b6('bum): pa pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// ting nge
221b7('bum): 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// de bzhin
222a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig
222a2('bum): par bya'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge
222a3('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang
222a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma 'o// blo 'o shes pa'o// shes rab bo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no//
222a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mgon no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ stong
222a6('bum): pa nyid thams cad ni lam mo/ / stong pa nyid thams cad ni snang ba'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni sgron ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni blo'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes pa'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes rab bo// stong pa nyid thams cad ni
222a7('bum): dpung gnyen no/ / stong pa nyid thams cad ni skyabs so// stong pa nyid thams cad ni mgon no// stong pa nyid thams cad ni ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni pha'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
222b1('bum): po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni lam mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no//
222b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni skyabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni mgon no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni ma'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni pha'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
222b3('bum): kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni lam mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni snang ba'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab bo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// yang dag par
222b4('bum): spong ba bzhi ni skyabs so/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni mgon no// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ma'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni pha'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
222b5('bum): ston par rig par bya ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni lam mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni
222b6('bum): skyabs so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni mgon no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni ma'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni pha'o// dbang po lnga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi ston par rig par bya
222b7('bum): ste/ dbang po lnga ni lam mo// dbang po lnga ni snang ba'o// dbang po lnga ni sgron ma 'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab bo// dbang po lnga ni dpung gnyen no// dbang po lnga ni skyabs so// dbang po lnga ni mgon no// dbang po lnga ni ma'o// dbang po lnga
223a1('bum): ni pha'o/ / stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ stobs lnga ni lam mo// stobs lnga ni snang ba'o// stobs lnga ni sgron ma 'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//
223a2('bum): stobs lnga ni dpung gnyen no// stobs lnga ni skyabs so// stobs lnga ni mgon no// stobs lnga ni ma'o// stobs lnga ni pha'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/
223a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni lam mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni snang ba'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni sgron ma 'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni dpung gnyen no// byang chub kyi yan lag
223a4('bum): bdun ni skyabs so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mgon no// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni ma'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni pha'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston
223a5('bum): par rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snang ba'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
223a6('bum): ni dpung gnyen no/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni skyabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mgon no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni pha'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol
223a7('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa
223b1('bum): rnams ni snang ba'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni skyabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mgon no// 'phags
223b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ bsam gtan rnams ni lam mo// bsam gtan rnams ni snang ba'o//
223b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni sgron ma 'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ bsam gtan rnams ni dpung gnyen no// bsam gtan rnams ni skyabs so// bsam gtan rnams ni mgon no// bsam gtan rnams ni ma'o// bsam gtan rnams ni pha'o//
223b4('bum): tshad pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ tshad pa rnams ni lam mo// tshad pa rnams ni snang ba'o// tshad pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// tshad pa rnams ni
223b5('bum): dpung gnyen no/ / tshad pa rnams ni skyabs so// tshad pa rnams ni mgon no// tshad pa rnams ni ma'o// tshad pa rnams ni pha'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223b6('bum): po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//
223b7('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni skyabs so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mgon no// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
224a1('bum): rnams ni ma'o/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni pha'o// rnam par thar ba brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo// rnam
224a2('bum): par thar pa brgyad ni snang ba'o/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'i shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mgon no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/
224a3('bum): ma'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ pha'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
224a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni snang ba'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni
224a5('bum): dpung gnyen no/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mgon no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
224a6('bum): pa dgu ni pha'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
224a7('bum): pa ni lam mo/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
224b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni skyabs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni
224b2('bum): mgon no/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa ni pha'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'
224b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mngon
224b4('bum): par shes pa rnams ni/ dpung gnyen no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ skyabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang
224b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni lam mo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dpung gnyen
224b6('bum): no/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni skyabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mgon no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni pha'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/
224b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni lam mo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni skyabs so// gzungs kyi sgo
225a1('bum): rnams ni mgon no/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni pha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin
225a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam mo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no// de bzhin
225a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni skyabs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mgon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pha'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
225a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// 'jigs pa
225a5('bum): bzhi ni skyabs so/ / 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon no// 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ so so
225a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag
225a7('bum): par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
225b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni lam mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'i shes pa'o shes
225b2('bum): rab bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni skyabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni mgon no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni
225b3('bum): ma'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni pha'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes
225b4('bum): pa nyid ni snang ba'o/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no// lam gyi
225b5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
225b6('bum): cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/ / rab 'byor byang chub kyi
225b7('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro/ /
226a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
226a2('bum): de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
226a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i
226a4('bum): dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi
226a5('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / ma dang pha dang dpung gnyen dang skyabs dang mgon yin no zhes brjod do// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
226a6('bum): po gzhan gyi dring 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems
226a7('bum): can yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226b1('bum): phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to/ / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i
226b2('bum): mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
226b3('bum): tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
226b4('bum): tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin kyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad
226b5('bum): kyis stong pa'o/ / rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
226b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
226b7('bum): 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
227a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang yang / stong pa nyid kyis kyang dben pa la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta
227a2('bum): bu na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la
227a3('bum): spyod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ sems can rnams ni yun ring po nas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
227a4('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba dben pa yin zhing / bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba stong pa yin mod/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa lags so/ bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags so// bcom ldan
227a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/
227a6('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag
227a7('bum): tu bya ba pa dang / bdag gir bya ba pa de la 'dzin pa / gang la 'dzin pa pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ba med de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang pas/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi
227b1('bum): rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ 'du shes la mi spyod/ 'du byed la spyod/ rnam par shes pa la
227b2('bum): spyod do/ / la spyod/ rna ba la spyod/ sna la mi spyod/ lce la spyod/ lus la spyod/ yid la spyod do// gzugs la spyod/ sgra la spyod/ dri la spyod/ ro la mi spyod/ reg la spyod/ chos la spyod do//
227b3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa la spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// gi
227b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la spyod do// gi 'dus te
227b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
227b6('bum): tshor ba la spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod do// sa'i khams la spyod/ chu'i khams la mi spyod/ khams la spyod/ rlung gi khams la mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams la spyod/ rnam par shes
227b7('bum): pa'i khams la spyod do/ / ma rig pa la spyod do// 'du byed la spyod/ rnam par shes pa la spyod/ ming dang gzugs la spyod/ skye mched drug la mi spyad/ reg pa la spyod/ tshor ba la spyod/ sred pa la spyod/ len pa la spyod/
228a1('bum): srid pa la spyod/ skye ba la spyod/ rga shi la mi spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
228a2('bum): la mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chen po
228a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba med pa
228a4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po pa'i ngo
228a5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/ dbang po rnams la spyod/ stobs rnams la mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
228a6('bum): spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod/ tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod/ rnam par
228a7('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la
228b1('bum): spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/ byams pa chen po la mi spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi
228b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa
228b3('bum): shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de
228b4('bum): ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis thub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
228b5('bum): cad kyis zil gyis gnon par nus so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis non pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
228b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis non pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar
228b7('bum): gyur pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
229a1('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa
229a2('bum): ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
229a3('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang /
229a4('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi
229a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du
229a6('bum): bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor

229b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag

229b7('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

230b3('bum): can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad

232b3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu
232b4('bum): gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
232b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
232b6('bum): ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la yang de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po
232b7('bum): mngon par bsgrub ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo// de dag rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pas dga'
233a1('bum): bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo// de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo// rab 'byor de ni byang chub
233a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// brtson 'grus
233a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang / sems can
233a4('bum): thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms
233a5('bum): dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
233a6('bum): dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi btson ran gnas pa'i sems can
233a7('bum): rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang
233b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na yang / des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs da bye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
233b2('bum): nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sngon cad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che
233b3('bum): de rnyed pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po
233b4('bum): che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo / / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
233b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
233b6('bum): yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
233b7('bum): la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' / yid la bgyi ba / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub
234a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/
234a2('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no//

234b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems 'jum mi 'gong / 'jigs sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

238b2('bum): skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
238b3('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang /

249a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// rab 'byor kyis
249a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
249b1('bum): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
249b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa
249b3('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
249b4('bum): 'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
249b5('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
249b6('bum): 'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
249b7('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
250a1('bum): stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
250a2('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
250a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
250a4('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags
250a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

250a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /

250b6('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
250b7('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/
251a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

251a3('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
251a4('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
251a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /

251b7('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
