252b6('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
252b7('bum): dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
253a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab
253a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
253a3('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab
253a4('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin
253a5('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
253a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
253a7('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
253b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
253b2('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
253b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /
253b4('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
253b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang
253b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de
253b7('bum): khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
254a1('bum): de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod
254a2('bum): dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su pa de skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
254a3('bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
254a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes
254a5('bum): bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod de ltar rtsol/ de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob
254a6('bum): par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
254a7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254b1('bum): chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba yang ma lags/ skye ba
254b2('bum): yang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
254b3('bum): gal te skye ba yang ma lags/ mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na
254b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta
254b5('bum): bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par
254b6('bum): rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes
254b7('bum): su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
255a1('bum): 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
255a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o//
255a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu lnga'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
255a4('bum): tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o//
255a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
255a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang
255a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
255b1('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
255b2('bum): te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
255b3('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
255b4('bum): thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par
255b5('bum): gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ glog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du
255b6('bum): nan tan byed na/ kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o//
255b7('bum): bye ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang
256a1('bum): rgyur yang bzod do/ / de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/
256a2('bum): tshad pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di g.yeng ba'i
256a3('bum): sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
256a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling
256a5('bum): gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag thams cad byang
256a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
256a7('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par
256b1('bum): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
256b2('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag
256b3('bum): thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang
256b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
256b5('bum): par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag
256b6('bum): kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
256b7('bum): spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
257a1('bum): d pa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro
257a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs
257a3('bum): mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257a4('bum): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan par nus so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
257a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o//
257a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang phang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
257a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la
257b1('bum): slob pa ma yin no/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o//
257b2('bum): kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig/ skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
257b3('bum): blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
257b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dod par sems so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po
257b5('bum): rab mtshe ma yang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu
257b6('bum): rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ / lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// tshangs pa mjed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems
257b7('bum): so/ / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par
258a1('bum): sems so/ / gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gnas
258a2('bum): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub
258a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus
258a4('bum): la 'byung 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ gi nad dam/
258a5('bum): rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la 'byung 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
258a6('bum): mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
258a7('bum): yon tan dang legs pa rjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
258b1('bum): bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa rjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
258b2('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang /
258b3('bum): legs pa rjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
258b4('bum): brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha'
258b5('bum): mngon du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
258b6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can
258b7('bum): mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams
259a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
259a2('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
259a3('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
259a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ston gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // kun dga'
259a5('bum): bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar
259a6('bum): 'ong ngo / / kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so// ma thos pas shes so// shes rab kyi
259a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed de/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha
259b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i
259b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa rjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa
259b3('bum): smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par
259b4('bum): 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
259b5('bum): ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
259b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang / bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ kun dga' bo byang
259b7('bum): chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
260a1('bum): phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ / nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
260a2('bum): phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ / nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
260a3('bum): pa ma yin no/ / khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems su byed na/ kun
260a4('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /
260a5('bum): spro ba dang nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
260a6('bum): dpa'i brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag stod gzhan smod la/ phyir
260a7('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la par rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan ma pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag stod gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji
260b1('bum): ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang
260b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
260b3('bum): rje'i 'jig rten pa dang / kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo
260b4('bum): mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na/ mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin du slob
260b5('bum): pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid du slob cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi
260b6('bum): 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul yang rab tu
260b7('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal
261a1('bum): te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di
261a2('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
261a3('bum): nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo// de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//
261a4('bum): kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis
261a5('bum): ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/ / 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams
261a6('bum): pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid
261a7('bum): bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ gal te des rnam
261b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal bar go ca bgo bar bya'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
261b2('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan ma mchis sam 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go ca bgo 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
261b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ kun dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /
261b4('bum): 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thabs rtsod de gshe ba dang / snyan par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon tu bzung ste gnas na/ kun dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/
261b5('bum): gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go ca bgo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan
261b6('bum): par brjod par gyur na yang / mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bstsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba
261b7('bum): dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la snyan par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar bya'i bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o//
262a1('bum): bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos
262a2('bum): na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ kun dga' bo byang chub
262a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan
262a4('bum): thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par bya'o/ / de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis
262a5('bum): 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams
262a6('bum): cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/
262a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i
262b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
262b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
262b3('bum): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong
262b4('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
262b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
262b6('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
262b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa
263a1('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
263a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa
263a3('bum): ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
263a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//
263a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu drug go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab kyis/ bcom
263a6('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
263a7('bum): kyis bka' pa/ rab nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab phyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//
263b1('bum): rab phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab chen
263b2('bum): po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni
263b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub
263b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub
263b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub
263b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
264a1('bum): rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /
264a2('bum): 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / ni gis stong / rna ba ni rna bas stong / sna ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni
264a3('bum): gzugs kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong / gi rnam par shes pa ni gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par
264a4('bum): shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / gi 'dus te reg pa ni gi
264a5('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /
264a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sna'i
264a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
264b1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong / khams ni khams kyis
264b2('bum): stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /
264b3('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / dang gzugs ni dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong / reg pa ni reg pas stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas stong /
264b4('bum): srid pa ni srid pas stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
264b5('bum): pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha
264b6('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni
264b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong po nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa
265a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
265a2('bum): ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
265a3('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
265a4('bum): rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong /
265a5('bum): stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
265a6('bum): ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad pa rnams ni tshad pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par
265a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar
265b1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge
265b2('bum): 'dzin rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / so so
265b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
265b4('bum): bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong /
265b5('bum): rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
265b6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub
265b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
266a1('bum): slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
266a2('bum): pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

288a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

294a1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'jigs pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/

299b2('bum): pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
299b3('bum): 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
299b4('bum): zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
299b5('bum): de ni ma lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
299b6('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/ de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba de/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
299b7('bum): slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
300a1('bum): phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

300a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

302a1('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par nus pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du phyir ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang

302a6('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
302a7('bum): rgyun gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
302b1('bum): ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o// zhes slob pa yin te/ rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'dir slob
302b2('bum): pa de ni/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can dmyal bar skye'o// byol song gi skye gnas su skye'o// gshin
302b3('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ / yul mtha' 'khob tu skye'o// yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o// phyag dar pa dang / gdol ba'i rigs su skye'o// zhar bar 'gyur ro// sgur por 'gyur ro// zha bor 'gyur ro// yan
302b4('bum): lag skyon can du 'gyur ro/ / 'on par 'gyur ro// lag pa med par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ro// srog gcod par 'gyur ro//
302b5('bum): ma byin pa len par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem par 'gyur ro// du smra bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma can du mi 'gyur ro// zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig kyal pa can du 'gyur ro// chags
302b6('bum): sems can du 'gyur ro/ / gnod sems can du 'gyur ro// log par lta bar 'gyur ro// 'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can du
302b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha tshe rings po'i nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa
303a1('bum): gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
303a2('bum): thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/ thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs pa'i
303a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
303a4('bum): dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
303a5('bum): thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de
303a6('bum): bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
303a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa cing 'god pa pa de ni/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de shes mthong bas/
303b1('bum): sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
303b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/

303b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

303b6('bum): brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
303b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
304a1('bum): stobs bcu la spyod/ 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan
304a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
304a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / 'jigs pa nyid rab du thob par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
304a4('bum): chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni
304a5('bum): nyung ngo / / rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas
304a6('bum): ches mang ngo / / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa
304a7('bum): de lta bu ni ches mang ngo / / rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches
304b1('bum): mang ngo / / rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan
304b2('bum): byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo / / de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
304b3('bum): mo 'di la spyod cing / the tsom par phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni/ gang phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo // rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa'i sa
304b4('bum): 'thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
304b5('bum): ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// le lo dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// shes rab 'chal pa dang
304b6('bum): ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// tshor
304b7('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / 'du shes dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rna ba dang ldan pa'i sems
305a1('bum): skye'o/ / sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lce dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lus dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// yid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// sgra dang ldan pa'i
305a2('bum): sems skye'o/ / dri dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// ro dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// reg dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// chos dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes
305a3('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems
305a4('bum): skye'o/ / gi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg
305a5('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// sna'i
305a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
305a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / sa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// chu'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// khams dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rlung gi khams dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// nam
305b1('bum): mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o//
305b2('bum): dang gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// skye mched drug dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// len pa dang
305b3('bum): ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / srid pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// skye ba dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rga shi dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
305b4('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// shes rab
305b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
305b6('bum): sems skye'o/ / chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o//
305b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o//
306a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid
306a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// yang dag par spong ba
306a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// stobs dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// 'phags
306a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs pa'i
306a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
306a6('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
306a7('bum): stobs dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems
306b1('bum): skye'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
306b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o/ / dgra bcom pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rang byang chub dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
306b3('bum): pa'i sems skye'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang pa de/ ma pas chos gang la yang sems
306b4('bum): bskyed pa do/ / rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur
306b5('bum): ro/ / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'jig tshogs su
306b6('bum): lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu dus byas par gyur ba'i 'tsho
306b7('bum): ba'i dbang po 'gags pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin
307a1('bum): te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
307a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin na// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems
307a3('bum): can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
307a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus
307a5('bum): thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang / sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
307a6('bum): pos rgyun ma 'chad par na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod
307a7('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
307b1('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chad pa dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub
307b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
307b3('bum): po/ sems can thams cad kyi bla na par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / gnas pa rnams kyi
307b4('bum): gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud
307b5('bum): par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang /
307b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ phun sum tshogs pa gang
307b7('bum): thob par bya ba de dag las 'thob pa gang yang do/ / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par
308a1('bum): bgyi ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya ste/ de la gnas par bya/
308a2('bum): 'dug par bya'i/ shes pa dang / mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/ de las 'da' bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par chud par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams
308a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha dang / dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
308a4('bum): 'jig rten na/ sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan
308a5('bum): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308a6('bum): la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs
308a7('bum): su nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin no// gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
308b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/ gal te de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
308b2('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa de gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
308b3('bum): byung ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu yang shes mthong zhing / de 'di snyam ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir/ 'di ni
308b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang do zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
308b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu bdun no// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
308b6('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
308b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
309a1('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
309a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
309a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
309a4('bum): bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
309a5('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yang spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
309a6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la yang spyod bzhin du/ sems can thams cad zil gyis non na/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
309a7('bum): par gyur na lta ci smos/ sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing / de dag gi 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
309b1('bum): bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/ sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ me tog
309b2('bum): man+dA ra ba mang po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ me tog man+dA ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// de
309b3('bum): ltar gtor te mngon par gtor ba dang / rab tu gtor bar byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
309b4('bum): pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams
309b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis
309b6('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos
309b7('bum): pa skyed cing / yang dang yang du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/ lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos/
310a1('bum): sman par mos/ bde bar mos shing / legs par bgyi bar mos te/ sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/ ci bdag rgal nas sems
310a2('bum): can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag dbugs phyin nas/ sems can dbugs ma byung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram/ ci bdag yongs su mya ngan
310a3('bum): las 'das nas/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/ yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
310a4('bum): rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
310a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang
310a6('bum): bar bgyid na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka gling chen po
310a7('bum): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i
310b1('bum): rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid
310b2('bum): kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad do// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi
310b3('bum): rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/ / kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha gcig
310b4('bum): gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad gyis/ tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan
310b5('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar
310b6('bum): bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni/ bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
310b7('bum): ldan 'das gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ gang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
311a1('bum): bskyed pa'i sems de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste/ gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la
311a2('bum): rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ / rjes su yi rang nas bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 'du shes su yang 'gyur ba de ltar yongs
311a3('bum): su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// kau shi ka gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni/ myur du de
311a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
311a5('bum): de dag dang ldan pa dag ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gror bya bar 'gyur ro// bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro// phu dud du bya bar 'gyur ro// mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro// des nam yang gzugs yid du 'ong ba
311a6('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / nam yang sgra yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ro// nam yang dri yid du 'ong ba tshor bar 'gyur ro// nam yang ro yid du 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro// nam yang reg yid du 'ong ba reg par
311a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba shes par mi 'gyur ro// nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
311b1('bum): bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod
311b2('bum): pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad grangs dpag tu pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas/ bla na
311b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can tshad grangs dpag tu pa yongs su mya ngan las
311b4('bum): bzlo bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ci nas kyang / sems pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
311b5('bum): po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// sems pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang /
311b6('bum): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
